metadata.name: Analyze Function Complexity
metadata.shortDescription: Analyze a specific function's complexity, structure, and provide detailed metrics similar to complexity analyzer output
metadata.description: Comprehensive function complexity analysis that calculates cyclomatic complexity, evaluates code quality indicators, assesses maintainability, and provides specific recommendations for improvement. Includes detailed breakdown of complexity sources, risk assessment, and refactoring opportunities.
objectives: Calculate cyclomatic complexity using standard patterns (decisions, loops, logical operators)
Analyze function structure including nesting depth and variable scope
Assess code quality indicators (readability, maintainability, testability)
Generate risk assessment with standard thresholds and actionable recommendations
Format comprehensive analysis report with detailed metrics
metadata.author: OLAF Framework

prompts.name: analyze-function-complexity
prompts.description: Main complexity analysis prompt with complete workflow for function analysis

templates.description: Standardized template for formatting function complexity analysis reports
